mapper.insert: insert into validate_sms (id, uid, phone, send_type, platform, template_id, status, gmt_create, gmt_send, version, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtSend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update validate_sms set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_type = #{sendType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_send = #{gmtSend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, uid, phone, send_type, platform, template_id, status, gmt_create, gmt_send, version, content from validate_sms where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select v_temp.phone, v_temp.times from (select phone, count(id) as times from validate_sms where DATE_FORMAT(gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') and template_id=1 and uid is null group by phone) v_temp where v_temp.times > #{times}
